channel.title: [Request] CLEAN 317 Client
channel.description:
I've been searching around for about an hour now (since I signed up.. for some reason my old account has disappeared / been deleted) and have come up with nothing (except moparscape's 317 client from this topic: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,345848.0.html, which was inside a jar inside another jar and does not come with compilation instructions). Mopar's one looks good however I can't seem to compile it without errors (on my side most likely. :p)
I've looked in the 'downloads' section but came out with only server sources or heavily edited clients. I also do not want one that has an 'ip changer', just one I can set to go to a specific IP.
Thanks in advance for any help :)
Please no flaming either... =/
Edit: Nevermind, found one on another website... lol edit 2: Nvm again.. still need one -.-

item.title: [Request] CLEAN 317 Client

item.title: [Request] CLEAN 317 Client
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

Don’t post requests for help that are related to not being able to compile or run your program.

Hence the don’t request unless it’s about compiling/running your program.

Read full topic

item.title: [Request] CLEAN 317 Client
item.dc:creator: @KingCold999 KingCold999
item.description:
@KingCold999 wrote:

noobs are ftw:

no requests

I checked the rules for this section before posting. The only “requests” that can’t be asked are ones due to the inability to compile a source, and that is not what I requested

this topic can be closed though, I found a source with literally nothing in it but the source. Now to make it load sprites from files…

Read full topic

item.title: [Request] CLEAN 317 Client
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Just google 317 Deob, search for a tutorial to make it load the 377 cache. You’re done. You have a 100% clean 317 client loading a 377 cache. From then on is up to you.

Read full topic

item.title: [Request] CLEAN 317 Client
item.dc:creator: @KingCold999 KingCold999
item.description:
@KingCold999 wrote:

@Scape I like to use “@” though, even if I dont have to.

and I did look in the downloads section, and searched the word ‘client’. Came up with MANY edited clients and sometimes even just server sources, and most of which didnt fit the parameters of what I needed (317, clean etc)

I’ll try on r–s, may have more luck there I suppose.

There should really be a sticky with the base clients like there is with the base servers though… would make things alot easier to find

Read full topic

item.title: [Request] CLEAN 317 Client
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

KingCold999:

@Scape : Had you read my post fully, you would see that I tried both of those to no avail. Both only lead me to client or heavily edited ones, or IP-Changing ones. =/

@You don’t need that when only one person posts in the thread, and actually I did read your post, twice. Try looking harder in the downloads section on all the forums, like here and R—s

Read full topic

item.description:
@KingCold999 wrote:

@Scape : Had you read my post fully, you would see that I tried both of those to no avail. Both only lead me to client or heavily edited ones, or IP-Changing ones. =/

I was going to use galkon’s client, but the version I found was also included an IP-Changer.

One that reads sprites would also be useful… I wished to get one to experiment with the interface editor / maker (by lin)
